articles.content: Despite missing 11 days of practice earlier this month, Tom Brady will start in the Tampa Bay Buccaneers' final preseason game of the summer against the Indianapolis Colts. Head coach Todd Bowles tol… [+1377 chars]

articles.title: Kurt Busch to miss start of Cup playoffs - NASCAR on NBC Sports
articles.description: Kurt Busch withdraws waiver to be eligible for the Cup playoffs, meaning Martin Truex Jr. holds the final provisional playoff spot entering Daytona.
articles.content:
Kurt Busch has withdrawn his waiver for the Cup playoffs and will miss the start of the playoffs, 23XI Racing stated Thursday morning.

articles.description: Thanks to Cristopher Sanchez, the Phillies' strategy to get their starting pitchers some extra rest worked out nicely Wednesday night. By Jim Salisbury
articles.content:
